content: 1 The Elder to the choice Kyria, and to her children, whom I love in truth, and not I only, but also all those having known the truth,
content_old: 1 The Elder to the choice Kyria, and to her children, whom I love in truth, and not I only, but also all those having known the truth,

content: 2 because of the truth that is remaining in us, and with us shall be to the age,
content_old: 2 because of the truth that is remaining in us, and with us shall be to the age,

content: 3 there shall be with you grace, kindness, peace, from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.
content_old: 3 there shall be with you grace, kindness, peace, from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.

content: 4 I rejoiced exceedingly that I have found of thy children walking in truth, even as a command we did receive from the Father.
content_old: 4 I rejoiced exceedingly that I have found of thy children walking in truth, even as a command we did receive from the Father.

content: 5 And now I beseech thee, Kyria, not as writing to thee a new command, but which we had from the beginning, that we may love one another,
content_old: 5 And now I beseech thee, Kyria, not as writing to thee a new command, but which we had from the beginning, that we may love one another,

content: 6 and this is the love, that we may walk according to His commands; this is the command, even as ye did hear from the beginning, that in it ye may walk.
content_old: 6 and this is the love, that we may walk according to His commands; this is the command, even as ye did hear from the beginning, that in it ye may walk.

content: 7 Because many leading astray did enter into the world, who are not confessing Jesus Christ coming in flesh; this one is he who is leading astray, and the antichrist.
content_old: 7 Because many leading astray did enter into the world, who are not confessing Jesus Christ coming in flesh; this one is he who is leading astray, and the antichrist.

content: 8 See to yourselves that ye may not lose the things that we wrought, but a full reward may receive;
content_old: 8 See to yourselves that ye may not lose the things that we wrought, but a full reward may receive;

content: 9 every one who is transgressing, and is not remaining in the teaching of the Christ, hath not God; he who is remaining in the teaching of the Christ, this one hath both the Father and the Son.
content_old: 9 every one who is transgressing, and is not remaining in the teaching of the Christ, hath not God; he who is remaining in the teaching of the Christ, this one hath both the Father and the Son.

content: 10 If any one doth come unto you, and this teaching doth not bear, receive him not into the house, and say not to him, ‘Hail!’
content_old: 10 If any one doth come unto you, and this teaching doth not bear, receive him not into the house, and say not to him, ‘Hail!’

content: 11 for he who is saying to him, ‘Hail,’ hath fellowship with his evil works.
content_old: 11 for he who is saying to him, ‘Hail,’ hath fellowship with his evil works.

content: 12 Many things having to write to you, I did not intend through paper and ink, but I hope to come unto you, and speak mouth to mouth, that our joy may be full;
content_old: 12 Many things having to write to you, I did not intend through paper and ink, but I hope to come unto you, and speak mouth to mouth, that our joy may be full;
